entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Upsala
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:02 PM CST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow. Local blowing snow overnight. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 12:28 AM CST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 12.
entry.summary: Snow ending early in the afternoon then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 12. Wind chill near minus 22. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 12:28 AM CST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 20 in the evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 12:28 AM CST Wednesday 15 February 2023
